title: Salam Hashim
text:
Salam Hashim () (born 1966) is an <a href="Iraqi%20people">Iraqi</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. He played as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>. He competed in the <a href="Football%20at%20the%201988%20Summer%20Olympics">men's tournament</a> at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a>.
Appearances in films.
Hashim makes a cameo appearance with <a href="Falah%20Hassan">Falah Hassan</a>, <a href="Laith%20Hussein">Laith Hussein</a> and <a href="Karim%20Saddam">Karim Saddam</a>, in the 1993 Iraqi <a href="film">film</a>: 100%.
